data.name: Touken Ranbu Warriors - Additional Music "Honmaru - Touken Ranbu Warriors"
data.detailed_description:
An arrangement of a piece from the source material "Touken Ranbu -ONLINE-". The piece is added to the music that can be selected from Change Honmaru Music.
Enjoy listening to soothing music at the honmaru.

Content:
- Additional Music "Honmaru - Touken Ranbu Warriors"

How to use:
Select the music from "Settings" - "Change Honmaru Music" from Honmaru.

Notes:
"Change Honmaru Music" can be used after clearing the game.
You can listen to additional music by selecting "Memoirs" - "Music Album" from Honmaru.
There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
To use this content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
